com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.engine

Class SpenPaintingSurfaceView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.SurfaceView
        • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.engine.SpenPaintingSurfaceView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable.Callback, AccessibilityEventSource, KeyEvent.Callback, SpenPaintingViewInterface, SpenSettingViewEraserInterface, SpenSettingViewInterface, SpenSettingViewPenInterface

    public class SpenPaintingSurfaceView
extends SurfaceView
implements SpenPaintingViewInterface
    This class provides methods for managing a painting view based GL.
    Since:
    4.1.0

        public void setHorizontalSmartScrollEnabled(boolean enable,
                                            Rect leftScrollRegion,
                                            Rect rightScrollRegion,
                                            int responseTime,
                                            int velocity)
        Sets smart horizontal scroll use or not
        Specified by:
        setHorizontalSmartScrollEnabled in interface SpenPaintingViewInterface
        Parameters:
        enable - true is use smart horizontal scroll, false is not use smart horizontal scroll.
        leftScrollRegion - left smart scroll operating resion
        rightScrollRegion - right smart scroll operating resion
        responseTime - scroll activity after time after hover enter
        velocity - scroll velocity (pixel)
        Since:
        5.0.0

        Returns:
